entity.name: product
entity.query: SELECT p.id as id, p.name, p.slug, CONCAT_WS(',', v.ean, p.keywords) as keywords, CONCAT_WS(',', v.value) as properties, br.name AS brand, v.ean, v.price, CONCAT("{\"route\":\"product_show\",\"params\":{\"slug\":\"", p.slug, "\"}}") AS routing, v.sku AS reference, util_loc.city AS town, CONCAT(CONCAT(util_loc.city, CONCAT(" (", SUBSTRING(util_loc.postcode, 1, 2))), ")") AS city_expanded, CONCAT(util_loc.latitude, ",", util_loc.longitude) AS coordinate, cat.title AS category, p.description AS content, CONCAT("/uploads/", REPLACE(REPLACE(SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(p.gallery, ":",3),":",-1), ",",1), "\"", ""), "\\/", "\/")) AS image, p.is_visible, stock_parser(v.stock), v.price, p.available_for_mail_order, p.available_in_my_shop, ss.idShop AS shops, v.special_price, IF (COALESCE(p.published_from, '0000-00-00 00:00:00') != '0000-00-00 00:00:00', p.published_from, NULL) as publication_date, IF (v.special_price IS NOT NULL, v.id, NULL) AS special_price_variant_id, IF (v.special_price IS NOT NULL, discount_rate_parser(v.special_price, v.price), NULL) AS discount_rate, IF (v.special_price IS NOT NULL AND v.special_price_from_date != '0000-00-00 00:00:00', v.special_price_from_date, NULL) AS special_price_from_date, IF (v.special_price IS NOT NULL AND v.special_price_to_date != '0000-00-00 00:00:00', v.special_price_to_date, NULL) AS special_price_to_date, cat.id AS product_category_id FROM product AS p INNER JOIN ( SELECT v1.*, MIN(v1.price) minprice, GROUP_CONCAT(vp.value) as value FROM variant AS v1 LEFT JOIN variants_properties as vp ON v1.id = vp.variant_id GROUP BY v1.product_id ) AS v ON p.id = v.product_id AND v.price = minprice LEFT JOIN products_categories AS pc ON p.id = pc.product_id LEFT JOIN category AS cat ON pc.category_id = cat.id LEFT JOIN products_shops AS ps ON p.id = ps.product_id LEFT JOIN shop_shop AS ss ON ps.shop_id = ss.idShop LEFT JOIN util_location AS util_loc ON ss.idLocation = util_loc.idLocation LEFT JOIN brand AS br ON p.brand_id = br.id

entity.name: category
entity.query: SELECT CONCAT_WS(',', c1.id, json_parent_ids_parser(c1.parent_ids)) AS category_parent_ids, CONCAT_WS(',', c1.id, json_parent_ids_parser(c1.parent_ids)) AS source_category_parent_ids FROM products_categories AS pc1 LEFT JOIN category AS c1 ON c1.id = pc1.category_id WHERE pc1.product_id ='${product.id}'

entity.name: navigation
entity.query: SELECT CONCAT_WS(',', n1.id, np1.navigation_id, n1.parent_id) AS navigation_parent_ids, n1.parent_id as parent_id FROM navigations_categories AS nc1 LEFT JOIN navigation AS n1 ON n1.id = nc1.navigation_id AND n1.lvl > 0 LEFT JOIN navigations_products AS np1 ON np1.product_id = '${product.id}' WHERE nc1.category_id IN ( ${category.source_category_parent_ids} )

entity.name: navigation_n2
entity.query: SELECT IF (json_parent_ids_parser(n2.parent_ids) != '', json_parent_ids_parser(n2.parent_ids), NULL) AS navigation_parent_ids FROM navigation n2 WHERE n2.id = '${navigation.parent_id}' AND n2.lvl > 0
